title: Ping Raise
body: Recently my ping went from 75-80 to 100-109 constant and idk why it has, has your ping been raised to?

replies.body: Nope. Your ping isn't bad though. I suggest restart your modem / router and your computer. Let us know the results.

A power cycle of your network is definitely a good starting point, as modems or routers can often be the culprits of network latency (ping) changes.

If you still have issues, you'll want to reach out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a set of [Hextech Repair Tool logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and the URL to a completed [Network Analysis.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

Let me know if you have any questions.
How do i Power cycle my network?

The steps that Rineyy mentioned: restarting your modem/router and your computer is a power cycle of your network. It sounds like you're still having issues, so I definitely recommend you submit a ticket with the logs I mentioned so our techs can help you out.
So i tried that and no difference. but thanks for the tip
